statements: SELECT * FROM WaterConsumptionLevels
SELECT RegionName, WaterConsumption FROM WaterConsumptionLevels WHERE WaterConsumption > 100
SELECT RegionName FROM WaterConsumptionLevels ORDER BY RegionName DESC
SELECT RegionID, RegionName FROM WaterConsumptionLevels WHERE WaterConsumption BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT AVG(WaterConsumption) AS AverageConsumption FROM WaterConsumptionLevels
SELECT * FROM WaterConsumptionLevels
SELECT RegionName, WaterConsumption FROM WaterConsumptionLevels WHERE WaterConsumption > 100 ORDER BY WaterConsumption DESC
SELECT AVG(WaterConsumption) AS AverageConsumption FROM WaterConsumptionLevels GROUP BY RegionID
SELECT RegionID, RegionName, WaterConsumption FROM WaterConsumptionLevels WHERE RegionID IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 5)
SELECT RegionID, RegionName, WaterConsumption FROM WaterConsumptionLevels WHERE RegionName LIKE '%A%'
SELECT * FROM regions;
SELECT region_name, region_id FROM regions WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM water_consumption ORDER BY consumption_level DESC;
SELECT region_name, consumption_level FROM regions JOIN water_consumption ON regions.region_id = water_consumption.region_id;
SELECT region_name, date_consumed FROM regions JOIN water_consumption ON regions.region_id = water_consumption.region_id WHERE regions.region_name = 'Region A';
SELECT * FROM regions WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT region_name, region_id FROM regions ORDER BY region_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM water_consumption WHERE date_consumed BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT region_name, consumption_level FROM regions JOIN water_consumption ON regions.region_id = water_consumption.region_id WHERE consumption_level > 100;
SELECT region_id, MAX(consumption_level) AS max_consumption FROM water_consumption GROUP BY region_id;
SELECT * FROM regions;
SELECT region_name, state FROM regions ORDER BY region_name ASC;
SELECT id, consumption, consumption_date FROM water_consumption WHERE consumption > 1000;
SELECT region_name, conservation_type, conservation_date FROM regions JOIN conservation_efforts ON regions.id = conservation_efforts.region_id;
SELECT region_name, state FROM regions WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT * FROM regions;
SELECT region_name, state FROM regions WHERE state='California';
SELECT region_name, conservation_type FROM regions INNER JOIN conservation_efforts ON regions.id = conservation_efforts.region_id;
SELECT region_name, consumption, consumption_date FROM regions INNER JOIN water_consumption ON regions.id = water_consumption.region_id WHERE consumption > 100;

SELECT region_name, conservation_type, conservation_date FROM regions INNER JOIN conservation_efforts ON regions.id = conservation_efforts.region_id WHERE conservation_type='Reforestation' ORDER BY conservation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM regions;
SELECT region_name FROM regions ORDER BY region_name ASC;
SELECT source_id, source_name FROM water_sources WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT source_name, amount FROM water_consumption WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM conservation_efforts WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM water_sources ORDER BY source_name DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT region_name, SUM(amount) AS total_consumption FROM regions JOIN water_sources ON regions.region_id = water_sources.region_id JOIN water_consumption ON water_sources.source_id = water_consumption.source_id GROUP BY region_name HAVING total_consumption > 100;
SELECT c.effort_id, c.strategy, r.region_name FROM conservation_efforts c JOIN regions r ON c.region_id = r.region_id WHERE c.start_date > '2021-01-01' AND r.region_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT MAX(amount) AS highest_consumption, MIN(amount) AS lowest_consumption FROM water_consumption;

SELECT region_name, COUNT(source_id) AS num_sources FROM regions LEFT JOIN water_sources ON regions.region_id = water_sources.region_id GROUP BY region_name HAVING num_sources >= 2 ORDER BY num_sources DESC;
SELECT * FROM region;
SELECT * FROM city WHERE city_id = 1;
SELECT city_name, water_consumed FROM city WHERE water_consumed > 100;
SELECT region_name, total_water_consumed FROM region ORDER BY total_water_consumed DESC;
SELECT source_type, source_capacity FROM water_source WHERE city_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM region WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT city_name, water_consumed FROM city WHERE city_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY water_consumed DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT source_type FROM water_source WHERE city_id = 1;
SELECT city_name, household_size FROM city JOIN household ON city.city_id = household.city_id WHERE household_size > 4;
SELECT region_name, conservation_method FROM region JOIN conservation_efforts ON region.region_id = conservation_efforts.region_id WHERE conservation_method LIKE '%reduction%';
